tool_description: Introducing our IMDb Top 250 API, your gateway to accessing the latest rankings of the finest cinematic masterpieces. Dive into a curated collection of the top 250 films, meticulously updated to reflect IMDb's latest ratings. With our API, effortlessly integrate these acclaimed movies into your applications, websites, or projects, enriching your content with cinematic excellence.
name: IMDB Top 250 Movies
title: IMDB Top 250 Movies

api_list.name: Get All Movies
api_list.description: Get all TOP 250 Movies ranked on IMDB
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-top-250-movies1.p.rapidapi.com/movies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-top-250-movies1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://imdb-top-250-movies1.p.rapidapi.com/movies"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "imdb-top-250-movies1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
